Name: Loop Room
About the game: The loop room is a horror game from the first person point of view, and the goal is to operate 5 panels in 100 repeated rooms and escape to the emergency exit. Run away from the endless room through various equipment and items. - Four kinds of maps : There are four different types of maps. Each map has different ghosts and sounds. Also, experience new fun in a different way from map to map. - Escape : You can escape after operating the panel with a key card that you can get around the room. You can guess the location from the compass displayed on the screen. - Two kinds of ghosts : each map with a ghost that moves randomly once every time you move the room. It consists of ghosts that keep wandering around the map looking for you. - Protection : Items you can get from moving around the room can be used before moving to another room to protect you. The only way to escape from a ghost wandering the map is to hide.
